label: 公人
対訳語: The temple equivalent of jinin [神人].
本: The Moneylenders of Late Medieval Kyoto . University of Hawai'i Press . 2001
説明文: The lowest-ranking members of Enryakuji itself; by the medieval period they were usually lay people who held a temple rank distinctly lower than that of santo, the third-level monks. [神人　延暦寺　山従]
